name: Eclipse (Haibo)
description:
Eclipse is a school project realized by 4 students (Our name is "Non Pas Encore") during our studies at ESA Saint-Luc Bruxelles.

By playing Eclipse you will discover a cooperative game in which the main mechanic is the fusion between the two players as well as a thrilling adventure with cinematics and home-made music.

The game is in French, but even if you don't speak it, we hope you will enjoy playing it! 

Cheers Thomas, Justine, Jose and Nathan

Music by Malik Djouad
